name: match_boxscore
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool football_data. Tool description: Broadage Football API can deliver any type of data for a football match, tournament or team; including livescores, play-by-play, boxscore, match statistics and many more. Our Football Coverage includes the biggest football tournaments from all around the world with in-depth coverage, giving you the opportunity to present the best sports data to users located anywhere.
This is a limited version in RapidApi. Please, click here to start your Free Trial and try the endpoints with live data now! API description: Live, detailed team and player statistics. **The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Football Match List or Fixture endpoints.** P.S. Full data is available at Boxscore endpoint but can not shown in mock response.

matchid.description: The ID of the basketball match for which the statistics are to be retrieved.
